state: Who's got a virtual machine and is about to play through an exciting round of TextWorld? You do! Here is how to play! First stop, recover the fresh laundry scented latchkey from the floor of the laundry place. Then, try to head south. And then, unlock the fresh laundry scented door in the salon. After that, make it so that the fresh laundry scented door is ajar. Having opened the fresh laundry scented door, attempt to take a trip south. With that accomplished, recover the American style keycard from the shelf in the studio. After that, unlock the American style gateway with the American style keycard. And then, doublecheck that the American style gateway inside the studio is ajar. And then, make an effort to take a trip east. With that done, go to the east. Then, attempt to travel south. With that done, open the gateway. Then, make an effort to travel west. After that, pick up the berry from the floor of the kitchen. And if you do that, you're the winner! -= Laundry Place =- You are in a laundry place. A typical kind of place. You make out a box. Huh, weird. There is an exit to the south. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is a fresh laundry scented latchkey on the floor. > -= Laundry Place =-0/1
next_state: You pick up the fresh laundry scented latchkey from the ground. > -= Laundry Place =-0/2
